alert.note: Alert for Divide (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 10 at 2:31PM CDT until April 14 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches possible. Some areas could see in excess of 12 inches of snow accumulation. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Divide County. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible heavy snow and blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
